member.name: T:Narumikazuchi.Serialization.IDeserializable`1
member.summary: Represents an object that can be serialized and deserialized.

member.name: M:Narumikazuchi.Serialization.IDeserializable`1.ConstructFromSerializationData(Narumikazuchi.Serialization.ISerializationInfoGetter)
member.summary: Constructs an object of type from the corresponding serialization data.
member.param: The object, which holds the deserialized information.
member.returns: The object of type containing the state that is stored in the serialization data

member.name: T:Narumikazuchi.Serialization.ISerializable
member.summary: Represents an object that can be serialized.
member.remarks:
If you plan to also deserialize a type you should use instead, since this interface does not implement a way to deserialize.
If you write a serializer for types that implement this interface, consider using on the object during the serialization process to prevent changes from other threads until the state retrieval finishes.

member.name: M:Narumikazuchi.Serialization.ISerializable.GetSerializationData(Narumikazuchi.Serialization.ISerializationInfoAdder)
member.summary: Retrieves the state of this object for serialization.
member.param: The object, which will hold the information to serialize.
